favourite.article: What an absolute divine peace! Father in Heaven I thanks YOU for YOUR love, mercy and grace in JESUS mighty name Amen!
I learned this in the early 1980s—Calvary Chapel—always loved it. Thanks.
Thank you Majem for praying for us all. What a great blessing. (See the prayer 2 comments away)

I learned this song as a child at summer camp meeting. I hum it often throughout my days. But what has blessed my soul is that my son's (all 5) whistle and hum it too. While they seem unaware that they are "copying mom" I am blessed that they have picked a prayer to the Lord to whistle through their day.

The song came to my spirit man as I was reading the great deliverance in Exodus 3:1. Especially vs 7 which clearly shows that God is aware of what we are passing through and will deliver when we cry unto Him in total submission. I pray in the name of Jesus that as you sing and meditate on the power of God that deliver to the uttermost God Himself will deliver You by His Mighty Powers. In the Name of Jesus.
I love this song at anytime, day or night.
My sister taught me this song 25+ years ago for some reason out of the blue I started singing it today. I only remembered the first 3 verses but it's kinda neat how the brain and God work. <3
This song came into my spirit so I decided to google it and it truly blessed my soul.

I'm glad I found this song in hymnal. I've known this song for years. I found this song by accident in youtube and have played over and over. I am waiting for the music to play this song so I can sing with the wordings. I hope this won't be played too fast. Unto me O Lord.
